title: The Bagelry
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Western, Fast food, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Locally owned bagel shop with a few locations.  Classic bagels, boiled and hearth baked. All bagels are vegetarian with some vegan choices. Several vegan sandwiches and bagel spreads including Toffuti, plus the in-house-made tofu-tom, tofu del fuego, hummus and new dehli spread. Good selection of veggie toppings from avocado to sprouts to olive spread to sun dried tomatoes. Also offers organic veggies, scrambagels, and bottled juices, including non dairy and vegan bottled smoothies. Bulletin board of local events. ATM on site. Free Wi-Fi.
